address.title: Select Address
address.description: Postal code: {postal_code}. Select an address from the list of available addresses for this postal code.

data_description.address: Select an address from the list of available addresses for the given postal code
data_description.update_interval: Data update interval in days (1 - 7 days)

error.invalid_format: Invalid format. Enter postal code in format ##-### (e.g. 02-001)
error.no_addresses: No addresses found for the given postal code
error.no_schedule_found: No current schedule found for the given address
